text:
That image is installed under icons/, so that line should either read:
or this particular image should be installed in htdocsdir
creator: andreas@netbank.com.br
trawick@apache.org
text:
With 2.0.35, apache_pb.gif is installed in both the htdocs dir and the icons dir.

If it is not installed correctly for you, what is your configure invocation?

creator: andreas@netbank.com.br
text:
You are right, it was my fault, the makefile is correct, my spec file isn't. It
was just including *html* files from the buildroot.

Sorry.
